Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the employment address of certain sex offenders to be reported to the division of criminal justice services
Summary: Requires the employment address of certain sex offenders to be reported to the division of criminal justice services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the employment address of sex offenders
